fulltext:
Curriculum Vitae 
VO VAN THANH 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
• 
Date of birth: 
1988 
•  Gender:  Male 
• 
Marital status: 
Married 
CARRER OBJECTIVE 
Sales Manager Position where my skills and experience can be effectively 
utilized for increased profitability and product sales volume by developing 
a dynamic team. 
HIGHLIGHTS 
• 
1 of 100 members of Moët Hennessy around the world selected to participate 
in Moët Hennessy Millennial Hub 2015 in Paris, France 
• 
7 years’ experience in FMCG industry, both channels General Trade (GT) 
and Modern Trade (MT) 
• 
Good negotiation skills & strong relationship with distributors, outlets 
• 
Proactive & lead team well to achieve/exceed targets 
• 
Good communication & presentation skills 
• 
Professional technical skills, excel skill, basic accounting knowledge so very 
effective in Reporting & Statistic Analysis 
• 
The youngest Sales Supervisor at current company (Moët Hennessy Vietnam) 
& previous company (Sapporo Vietnam) 
EXPERIENCE 
September 2018 – present: Key Account Manager – Modern Retail 
• 
Responsibility 
- 
Take care of modern trade channel, responsible for listing product to all 
MR account available in Vietnam. 
- 
Responsible for build business plan, marketing plan, promotion 
plan, development plan for MT channel. 
- 
In line with company long term and short-term objective 
- 
Lead, track and manage the team to execute, follow up the plan, provide training 
and coaching to help team develop their career. 
- 
Ensure all objective and target given by line manager will be achieved. 
- 
Responsible to attend all meeting relative to channel, assist MKT to have proper 
support to MT channel, provide market data, report, competitor' s information and 
idea to develop the channel. 
July 2014 – September 2018: Modern Trade Sales Supervisor at Moët Hennessy 
Vietnam 
• 
Responsibility 
- 
Manage key accounts: MM Mega Market, Co.op mart, Lotte Mart, BigC, Emart… 
in HCMC & South Provinces 
- 
Buget planning and controlling. 
- 
Dealing trading term, display contract with Super Market/ Hyper Market. 
- 
Prepare, Implement, follow up and update Customer (s) Plans 
- 
Product display planning to achieve display coverage target. 
- 
Pushing distributors for on time delivery. 
- 
Pushing distributor’ sales & supervising SE team to achieve sales target. 
- 
Sales report 
- 
Control & pushing distributors stock, supermarkets stock 
- 
Visit supermarkets & distributors daily to explore business opportunity, supervise 
competitors’ activities, investigate selling prices, relationship building, team 
building 
• 
Achievement 
- 
95% sales target & display coverage target 2014 
- 
134% sales target & excellent display coverage target 2015 
- 
Top 100 employees of Moët Hennessy global to join Millennial Hub Meeting in 
France 
- 
110% sales target & excellent display coverage target 2016 
- 
140% sales target & excellent display coverage target 2017 
December 2013 – July 2014 : Sales Supervisor (General Trade-ON) at Sapporo 
Vietnam Ltd., 
Responsible 
- 
Manage 5 Sales Representative, 2 distributors and 135 outlets in District 1 & 
Binh Thanh district 
- 
Generates sales and contributes to the volume and profit performance of the 
company by planning, executing and evaluating sales and marketing programs 
and activities in assigned area 
- 
Generates regular action plans, prepares budget and controls the same for each 
direct route and dealer route in order to achieve sales and profit targets 
- 
Responsible for sales, outlets and business contracts 
- 
Negotiates with institutions in order to achieve exclusivity and penetration as well 
as concessions for the company 
- 
Manage, train and motivate sales team to achieve target 
- 
Customer care and handling complaint 
- 
Achieve and exceed the sales target 
- 
Monitor competitor activities 
- 
Assist Area Sales Manager/Regional Sales Manager information about the 
market, competitor, and outlets’ activation 
Achievement 
- 
Sales volume achieved min 80% and max 120%, in average I sell out 5,300 
crates per month 
- 
Signed and resigned many contracts with many big outlets in assigned area 
- 
Good relationship with distributors 
- 
One of the best Sales Supervisor that achieves over target as always 
- 
Good reporting skills 
- 
Contribute great ideas for company promotion 
September 2011 - November 2013: Sales Representative (ON-OFF) at Sapporo 
Vietnam Ltd., 
Responsible 
- 
Work with 2 distributor 
- 
Sales area: Phu Nhuan district (OFF), Go Vap district (ON) 
- 
Execute monthly goals as related to business activities 
- 
Achievement of annual sales and accounts sold goals 
- 
Develop and maintain effective customer relations and promote the good will of 
the company 
- 
Provide daily, weekly, and monthly reports and accomplishment recap to Sales 
Supervisor 
- 
Other duties as assigned by Sales Supervisor 
Achievement 
- 
Sales volume achieved min 90% and max 120%, in average I sell out 1,000 
crates per month 
- 
One of the best Sales Representative 
- 
Make an assigned district become one of the best district have high sales volume 
- 
Always exceed targets 
- 
Be promoted to Sales Supervisor after 1 year 
March 2010 - May-2011: Payable accountant at AMG 
Responsible 
- 
Manage company’s expenses 
- 
Make reports to Chief Accountant about corporate controller 
- 
Tax reporting 
- 
Analysis of loan schemes 
Experience 
- 
Reporting skill 
Analyze skill 
Microsoft office skill 
Accounting rules understanding 
Hard situation overcome ability 
Support very well to Sales jobs later 
- 
- 
- 
- 
- 
EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS 
• 
2006 - 2009: Full-time University Student 
• 
Oct, 2009: Graduated from Saskatchewan Institute of Applied Science and 
Technology (SIAST, Canada), major in Business Management 
SKILLS & STRENGH 
• 
Presentation, Negotiation, Communication 
• 
Reporting, Analysis, Statistic 
• 
Customer focus, Complain handling, Problem solving 
• 
Time management 
• 
English: especially speaking and listening 
• 
Team work and independence work well 
• 
Honest, high responsible 
• 
Ambitious, Enthusiastic, Smart working 
• 
Opened mind, Friendly and Optimistic 
INTEREST 
• 
Traveling

educations.school: Saskatchewan Institute of Applied Science and Technology (SIAST

experiences.detail:
• Responsibility - Take care of modern trade channel, responsible for listing product to all
MR account available in Vietnam. Responsible for build business plan, marketing plan, promotion plan, development plan for MT channel.
In line with company long term and short-term objective
Lead, track and manage the team to execute, follow up the plan, provide training and coaching to help team develop their career.
Ensure all objective and target given by line manager will be achieved.
Responsible to attend all meeting relative to channel, assist MKT to have proper support to MT channel, provide market data, report, competitor' s information and idea to develop the channel.

• Responsibility - Manage key accounts: MM Mega Market, Co.op mart, Lotte Mart, BigC, Emart... in HCMC & South Provinces - Buget planning and controlling.
- Dealing trading term, display contract with Super Market/ Hyper Market. - Prepare, Implement, follow up and update Customer (s) Plans - Product display planning to achieve display coverage target.
- Pushing distributors for on time delivery.
- Pushing distributor’ sales & supervising SE team to achieve sales target.
- Sales report
- Control & pushing distributors stock, supermarkets stock
- Visit supermarkets & distributors daily to explore business opportunity, supervise competitors’ activities, investigate selling prices, relationship building, team building
• Achievement - 95% sales target & display coverage target 2014 - 134% sales target & excellent display coverage target 2015 - Top 100 employees of Moët Hennessy global to join Millennial Hub Meeting in
France - 110% sales target & excellent display coverage target 2016 - 140% sales target & excellent display coverage target 2017

esponsible
- Manage 5 Sales Representative, 2 distributors and 135 outlets in District 1 & Binh Thanh district
- Generates sales and contributes to the volume and profit performance of the company by planning, executing and evaluating sales and marketing programs and activities in assigned area
- Generates regular action plans, prepares budget and controls the same for each direct route and dealer route in order to achieve sales and profit targets

- One of the best Sales Representative - Make an assigned district become one of the best district have high sales volume
